name: Upon This Rock
description:
"Who am I..?"

Upon This Rock is a first person horror game set on a desolate island. Find the journal pages and piece together the story of this island and those who once lived here. But watch out, the island is not yet completely deserted, and strange lights haunt the night sky...

Follow me on Twitter for future games: https://twitter.com/TheMagistraten

NOTE: For the best experience, I highly recommend playing this game alone, in a silent and dark room, while wearing headphones. Enjoy!

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
Left shift - Run
E - Interact
Q - Cancel
Escape - Pause

Known Bugs: The optimization is still a bit bad, so I should probably work on fixing that, also sometimes the game crashes after the end slide. If you find any more let me know! 

To Be Added: Some more props, maybe an easter egg or two, and also a credits page!
